segments.text: I can't believe my eyes, the sink is overflowing right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge in a huge sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s drying dishes totally unaware, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes on the counter, pristine amid the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, a boy's climbing the stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool’s tipping, he’s reaching in with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s holding a plate too, like it’s all normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s beside him, arm up expecting treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window shows a serene garden, shocking contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar’s full, labeled clearly up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything’s so ordinary yet on the brink of mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected to see kids sneaking like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water’s puddle widening, no one reacts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me completely off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR
